name: Find Your Office!
description: This is a game I made for a college class I am taking so it is my first game and it isn't the best but for those of you that look into it I hope you enjoy! This is about an employee that just got hired to a new job who ended up losing the instructions that lead to his new office. The employee now must try all the floors in the building to try and find his office and each floor brings its own unique theme and different people to come across.
